Interface FileService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileServiceImpl

    public interface FileService
    CRUD operations with files

                int version)

      • listAllFiles

        java.util.List<VersionedFile> listAllFiles(java.lang.String namespace,
                                           boolean allVersions,
                                           boolean metaDatabase)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Lists all files in specified namespace
        Parameters:
        namespace - "/" for ALL, specify namaspace to filter
        allVersions - true for all versions, false for just the latest ones
        metaDatabase - whether to list metaDatabase instead of document database
        Returns:
        files as PathVersionPair
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listAllFilesByFileType

        java.util.List<VersionedFile> listAllFilesByFileType(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                     boolean allVersions,
                                                     boolean metaDatabase,
                                                     FileType fileType)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Lists all files in namespace non-recursively
        Parameters:
        namespace - "/" for ALL, specify namaspace to filter
        allVersions - true for all versions, false for just the latest ones
        metaDatabase - whether to list metaDatabase instead of document database
        fileType - One of supported file types like WAR, XSD, WSDL
        Returns:
        files as PathVersionPair
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listAllFilesByFileTypeRecursively

        java.util.List<VersionedFile> listAllFilesByFileTypeRecursively(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                boolean allVersions,
                                                                boolean metaDatabase,
                                                                FileType fileType)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        List all files in namespace recursively
        Parameters:
        namespace - "/" for ALL, specify namaspace to filter
        allVersions - true for all versions, false for just the latest ones
        metaDatabase - whether to list metaDatabase instead of document database
        fileType - One of supported file types like WAR, XSD, WSDL
        Returns:
        files as PathVersionPair
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
